channel.title: Downloading Videos Directly from YouTube
channel.description:
[center]Hello Boys and Girls.
What do you think of this website, Personally the overall look of it is awful, but the overall content is immense![/center]
[center][url=http://kickyoutube.com/]KickYouTube[/url] | [url=http://kickyoutube.com/]KickYouTube[/url] | [url=http://kickyoutube.com/]KickYouTube[/url][/center]
[center]What this site does; It connects to YouTube's database and retrieves all the videos, Then uploads them to its own server and allows you to search and select any video to download.. [b]for free[/b] to your own computer.
This site isn't blocked at school's either (well its not blocked at mine (well it wasn't last time i went lol)) so you can watch videos from youtube at school[/center]
[center][url=http://kickyoutube.com/]KickYouTube[/url][/center]

item.title: Downloading Videos Directly from YouTube
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:11, topic:333443”][quote author=IceTICKER link=topic=429848.msg3156513#msg3156513 date=1269109081]
Theres not gunna be a youtube anymore they got a lawsuit from the president obama too take it down because it has a bunch of stolen content from deffrent people if you wanna watch the full video about this put “Cnn - Youtube” Something should pop up
[/quote]
lol

I think you mean viacom want to sue youtube because they’re bitching about copyright infringement from thousands of videos on the site. Yes, it’s $1billion; but google wont shutdown youtube if they sued. That’s if they do get sued anyway… which I doubt.[/quote]It states in Youtube’s ToS somewhere that any video uploaded is the users personal property and in no way does Youtube affiliate with the users that upload their material to the site.

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading Videos Directly from YouTube
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:4, topic:333443”]javascript:var jsonargs = yt.getConfig("SWF_ARGS");window.location.href = 'http://youtube.com/get_video?video_id=' + jsonargs.video_id + '&fmt=18' + '&l=' + jsonargs.l + '&sk=' + jsonargs.sk + '&fmt_map' + jsonargs.fmt_map + '&t=' + jsonargs.t;

paste this into address bar on the page and your browser will download the video as an mp4 file. You can then use FFMPEG to convert it to whatever format if needed.[/quote]

Wow this is nice, Im guessing its kind of the same priniciple taht people use to select all friends on facebook.

Read full topic

javascript:var jsonargs = yt.getConfig("SWF_ARGS");window.location.href = 'http://youtube.com/get_video?video_id=' + jsonargs.video_id + '&fmt=18' + '&l=' + jsonargs.l + '&sk=' + jsonargs.sk + '&fmt_map' + jsonargs.fmt_map + '&t=' + jsonargs.t;

paste this into address bar on the page and your browser will download the video as an mp4 file. You can then use FFMPEG to convert it to whatever format if needed.
